channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Huge pothole, 4th February
item.description:
Large pothole in the Hatherley Road not far from the Hatherley Inn Pub..by some road furniture
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 314, Hatherley Road, Hatherley, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: This very busy section of road has 2 deep holes along with the metre long depressed area as per the photos. Considereing this road is currently closed, it would make sense to make repair now to reduce the disruption., 4th February
item.description:
This area is located on New road Woodmancote at the junction with 2 Hedges Road. Please refer to the junction hash markings for precise location.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): New Road, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Huge pothole, 4th February
item.description:
Huge pothole in the 'prestigious' part of the Promenade
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 70, Promenade, Montpellier, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Horrendous pot holes along the road, 4th February
item.description:
From the last garden fence where there is a pathway beside it upto the old arle nurseries. Cars and vans swerving all over the place. These have been reported yet they still have not been repaired. Cars have to be roadworthy yet this road isn't
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 14, Barley Close, Kingsditch, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: BT manhole cover loose / failed (on pavement), 4th February
item.description:
BT manhole cover loose / failed (on pavement)
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 3, King William Drive, Cheltenham

item.title: 2x Manhole cover / drain cover issue; level below road surface and presents as a pothole when driven over., 4th February
item.description:
2x Manhole cover / drain cover issue; level below road surface and presents as a pothole when driven over.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Old Bath Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Broken and damaged paving slabs, 4th February
item.description:
These are outside No 4 Priors road, they recently had the Electricity board in to replace their supply cable for a car charger, and they were not laid back correctly, plus they have two electric cars, and have removed the front boundary wall from the property, so that these behemoths damage the footpath every time they drive over it
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 14, Priors Road, Whaddon, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large pothole (80cm wide) + road and verge damage, 4th February
item.description:
Outside 72 East End Road. Pothole is large (80cm) and growing - surrounding tarmac is all crack so is likely to growth further. Substantial damage has been done to verge in front of property wall. Damage has occurred since the A40 bridge diverson has been in place - over the last few months

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 70, East End Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: TMC - Defects -CW10 Potholes problem, 4th February
item.description:

Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: A pothole in road problem, 4th February
item.description:
Deeper than a golf ball, wider than a dinner plate . Customer believes pothole has suddenly appeared, possibly after previous/recent repair.
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Light sensor is not detecting vehicles problem, 4th February
item.description:
Customer reporting that the floodlights on the RaB appear to have been spun around and now face oncoming traffic - overnight the lights were dazzling the northbound traffic when approaching the RaB reducing visibility
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Light sensor is not detecting vehicles
